critique: The document is an approval of an agreement related to the National Industrial Recovery Act. As the President, I aim to convey a sense of stability, progress, and fairness. Fear would be low, as the agreement aims to reduce uncertainty. Disgust would be negligible. Surprise would be low, as the process is presented as orderly and expected.
